page.title: 19RISELEY PARISH COUNCIL
page.content: This is an elected body which has the duty of looking after local affairs. The Committies are as follows:- 1.Footpaths,Lighting and brook 2.Planning 3.Administration(including allotments )Grass cutting. Representatives serve on the Village Hall Committee,Riseley Recreational Association,Youth Club Committee,Noise Abatement Committee, Lower School Managers and Parochial Church Council. An alternative footpath map has been established and lighting has been brought up to date at the cost of around Â£3000. Brook.Flooding is less frequent since the brook was thoroughly cleared a few years ago.
